code: import React from"react";import{useParams}from"react-router";import charList from"../characterList";import"./CharacterPage.css";var CharacterPage=function CharacterPage(){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var char=charList.filter(function(char){return char.id===id;})[0];var name=char.name,photo=char.photo,keyline=char.keyline,who=char.who,why=char.why;return React.createElement("div",{className:"container"},React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("div",{className:"row"},React.createElement("div",{className:"col-lg-4 col-md-6 col-sm-12"},React.createElement("img",{style:{width:"100%"},src:photo,alt:name})),React.createElement("div",{className:"col-lg-8 col-md-6 col-sm-12"},React.createElement("h1",{className:"CharacterName"},name),React.createElement("p",{className:"KeylineContainer"},keyline),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("br",null),React.createElement("h4",null,"Who?"),who.map(function(p,idx){return React.createElement("p",{key:idx},p);}),React.createElement("h4",null,"Why?"),why.map(function(p,idx){return React.createElement("p",{key:idx},p);}))));};export default CharacterPage;
